alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Higher Elevations of Indiana; Indiana; Westmoreland; Westmoreland Ridges (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 27 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...AREAS OF HEAVIER SNOW WILL AFFECT INDIANA...WESTMORELAND AND SOUTHERN ARMSTRONG COUNTIES... At 1058 PM EST, areas of heavier snow located from Vandergrift to Indiana as well as Greensburg to Ligonier were moving east at 30 mph. Winds in excess of 30 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow along with reduced visibilities and quick accumulations on roadways. Locations impacted include... Greensburg, Indiana, Jeannette, Latrobe, Vandergrift, Homer City, Apollo, Murrysville, McChesneytown-Loyalhanna, Blairsville, Youngwood, Derry, Delmont, Lawson Heights, New Stanton, Leechburg, Ligonier, Black Lick, Calumet-Norvelt, and Clymer. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Pennsylvania near mile marker 57. Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 73 and 77. Snow will lead to reduced visibilities and hazardous travel conditions.

area.areaDesc: Armstrong; Higher Elevations of Indiana; Indiana; Westmoreland; Westmoreland Ridges
